name: Bourbon Glazed Carrots
author: Flipper
summary: Sweet carrots are drizzled in a warm buttery sauce flavored with bourbon.
ingredients: 2 pounds carrots, peeled and sliced diagonally into 1/2-inch pieces
2 tablespoons bourbon, or more to taste
directions: Place carrots in a large pot and cover with water; bring to a boil
Reduce heat to medium-low and simmer until tender yet firm to the bite, 10 to 15 minutes
Drain and transfer to a serving bowl
Combine brown sugar, butter, and bourbon together in a saucepan; bring to a simmer
Cook and stir sauce until thickened, about 10 minutes
Pour sauce over carrots and serve immediately
